Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

Dell Inspiron Compact Desktop 3891 is engineered with: 11th Generation Intel® Core i5-11400 processor (6-Core, 12M Cache, 2.6GHz to 4.4GHz), 12GB 2933MHz DDR4 (8Gx1 + 4Gx1, 1 TB 7200 RPM [SATA] (HDD) 3.5-inch, Intel® UHD Graphics 730 with shared graphics memory, Black
11th Generation Intel Core i5-11400 processor (6-Core, 12M Cache, 2.6GHz to 4.4GHz)
12GB 2933MHz DDR4 (8Gx1 + 4Gx1), 1 TB 7200 RPM SATA HDD 3.5-inch
Intel Wi-Fi 6 2×2 (Gig+) + Bluetooth 5.1

Previous page
Next page

Performance you can count on

Latest processor: Built with the latest 11th Gen Intel Core i5 processor you can expect fast, reliable performance and an exceptional PC experience.

  • 11th Gen Intel Core i5-11400 processor (6-Core, 12M Cache, 2.6GHz to 4.4GHz)
  • Intel UHD Graphics 730 with shared graphics memory
  • 1TB 7200RPM 3.5″ SATA hard drive
  • 12GB (8Gx1 + 4Gx1) DDR4, 2933MHz memory

Minimal design, maximum efficiency.

Space-saving exterior: Our latest Inspiron Compact Desktop is designed to be space-efficient to compliment your work from home setup or office environment.

Finish tasks faster: Watch all your applications perform at their fullest with features including memory of 12GB DDR4, at 2933 MHz.

Your command center: Connect all your devices in a snap with plenty of front facing ports for easy access.

Ports and Slots

1. Power Button | 2. Global Headset Jack | 3. (2) USB 2.0 | 4. (1) USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-C | 5. (1) USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A

Essential accessories for your Inspiron Compact Desktop

Dell Keyboard & Mouse -KM7120W

Pivot, tilt, swivel and adjust the height for a comfortable setup all day long.

Easy Pairing

Instantly pair each device with your compatible Windows 10 system via Bluetooth.

Stay organized between applications, emails and windows on one screen.

(as of Nov 30,2022 04:59:46 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Choose SMALLRT, Choose Safety

SMALLRT is a comprehensive high-tech enterprise dedicated to the research and development, production and sales of sockets such as power strip, outlet extender, power strip tower.

SMALLRT power strip combine safety, practicality and aesthetics, and are suitable for various places such as office, home, hotel and so on.

A. How did we start?

The SMALLRT brand was founded in 2001. It combines safety, practicality and aesthetics. Once the power strip came out, it was favored by many consumers.

B. What makes our products unique?

We focus not only on safety but also on the practicality and aesthetics of our products. The power strip will also be tested at various levels before they leave the factory.

C. Why do we love what we do?

It is our founder’s goal to let everyone use SMALLRT power strip, and it is the work tenet of every SMALLRT person to make every consumer fall in love with our power strip.

【Overload Protection and Surge Protection 】The surge protector power strip will automatically cut power to protect your expensive devices when a voltage surge is detected. The reset/off switch with integrated circuit breaker for overload protection of all outlets. This outlets power strip has 8-overload protection.
【UL Approved Safe and Durable 】The 6FT upgraded extension cord with multiple outlets is UL approved and made of pure copper. Reinforced design at the junction of the stand of power strip tower and the wire head. To protect the terminal from wear and tear. Environmental protection and fire-resistance PC shell with flame retardant at 1382℉ makes it more durable and longer lifetime.
【USB- C Charge Up to 30% Faster 】4 USB ports total 3.4A, each USB A port features 2.4A Max output. USB C charging port features 3A Max. Built-in with smart technology, detecting charging devices and deliver optimal charging speed automatically, compatible with most USB devices.
【16 IN 1 Tower Power Strip with USB】- This power strip tower surge protector with 12 AC outlets and 4 smart USB (1 USB C) charging ports(5V/3.4A) can power up to 16 electronic devices simultaneously. Integrated circuit breaker and 1800 Joules protection rating ensure the safety of your electronics.
【What You will Get】 Power strip with USB ports, Maunal, our worry-free 12-month, our life time technology support and friendly customer service.The steady base with anti-slip mat on the bottom effectively avoid wobbling and slipping around.

In the event of power overload, the reliable safety switch will trip off automatically to protect your devices and your home. The switch on the base is designed to be perfectly loose, to ensure it won’t get stuck after long time of use. Extension Cord with Multiple Outlets is your best chose!

  • Model: ZYC06
  • Rated Voltage: 110-250V~
  • Rated Current: 10A
  • Maximum Power: 250V / 2500W
  • Frequency: 50/60HZ
  • USB-A Output: 5V 2.4A
  • USB C Output: 5V-3A
  • USB Total Output: 5V-3.4A
  • Material: ABS+Firepoof Material
  • Using Temperature: -10℃～+40℃
  • Power cord specification: 3×0.75mm²
  • Safe protect: Overload Protector Mmultiprise Electrique

Reinforcement of Wire Interface to Prevent Wear

The power strip with USB ports cable is made of 100% copper wire, which power strip tower surge protector has a highly conductive and the cable has good flexibility. And the reinforcement design of the tail makes the product more durable.

Read more

Heat Resistant

This fireproof extension cord with USB Ports is made of ABS+PC, whose ignition temperature is as high as 1382℉ and self-extinguishes right away after it is ignited by fire from outside, the highest level fire-retardant material, it’s very safe and value for money.

Anti-slip mat Sturdy and thicked Base

The power strip tower thicked and broadened base with anti-slip mat on the bottom make the power strip town steadier, maximally preventing wobbling and sliding around.

Two-in-one design

It contain Main swith and overload protection in this switch.

At the RESET side, USB-A & USB-C & AC Outlets are at work. protector de sobretensiones protects your home’s expensive equipment

Easy to Carry Travel

Size: 6 * 5 * 3.5

Strong product stability. The unique design makes the surge protector tower easy to carry. Small footprint. You can take it anywhere.

Price: $329.99 - $249.94
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:22:39 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Choose KAMRUI, Choose Professional Mini PC

KAMRUI JK06 FANLESS MINI DESKTOP PC

—A partner you need whether in the office or at home—

Are you still worried about your traditional desktop pc taking up a large space? Don’t worry!

The new KAMRUI JK06 mini pc with the magnetic stand is a sleek alternative to a traditional tower PC.

■ The fanless design, more silent!

■ Honeycomb design, more solid!

■ The magnetic stand, more steady!

■ Expandable storage, more capacity!

■ Compact size and lightweight, more flexible!

■ The 11th gen N5100 processor with low consumption, more durable!

Add More Power to Your Workspace with the KAMRUI JK06 Mini PC with 11th-gen Intel processor

The fanless mini pc is equipped with an 11th generation Intel Jasper Lake N5100 (4M Cache, up to 2.90 GHz ) processor. Compared to the Intel Celeron Jasper Lake N5095 (15W), a low-power 6W Mini computer that reduces power consumption by up to 150%. For performance, the JK06 mini computer tower is improved by 30% more than Intel Celeron J4125. Lower power consumption makes it generate less heat and has outstanding performance.

Create A More Peaceful Environment for Your Lovely Babies or Wife

Let’s take a closer look, and see what we discover!

Packed with Connectivity

Designed with 2 x USB 2.0 ports, 2 x USB 3.0 ports, 1 x Type C (data transfer only), 1 x Gigabit Ethernet port, 1 x Micro SD Card port, 1 x HDMI port and 1x VGA port (# of Displays Supported: # of 2), 1 x Audio Jack port.

Strong Network Support

KAMRUI JK06 micro computer providing Wi-Fi-5, Bluetooth 4.2, 2.4G+5G dual band WiFi and network connectivity, these ensures you can do everything you want at the speeds you need.

Install the OS You Want

KAMRUI JK06 mini computer tower preinstalled Windows 11 pro OS. Moreover, if you want to install Windows 10, Ubuntu or Linux. The compact pc will support and be compatible with different operating systems.

Transfer Files in Seconds

Transfer movies, photos, and music at speeds of up to 5 Gbps via the USB-C port and the dual USB 3.0 ports, saving you time on large file transfers between your mini pc and external hard drives or networks.

To Create! To Win! Don’t Let the Storage Limit Your Imagination

Massive storage capacity for storing huge amounts of pictures, videos, music and more.

KAMRUI small form factor pc has 3 ways to expand the storage as below:

1. The micro SD card slot also support up to 128GB of expandable storage;

2. It’s expandable with the addition of up to 2 TB of 2.5-inch SSD or HDD[NOT INCLUDED] fitted in the base expansion box.

3. The mini pc designed with 4 USB ports which you can add USB flash drives[NOT INCLUDED] or external hard drives[NOT INCLUDED].

Designed for Those who Work and Study in A Small Space Without Much Room on Their Desk

With JK06 mini PC versatility, plus better connectivity with HDMI 2.0 (4K@60Hz) and VGA ports(1080 P), the compact and lightweight PC adapts to you.

The magnetic stand that comes with JK06 minipc as a gift, it is a capable and affordable Windows 11 Pro desktop computer that you can place almost anywhere given its small form factor. Whether vertical or horizontal style placed if you entered an idea bottleneck, why not try a different placed mode? If you don’t want to JK06 mini pc comes with the magnetic stand, just take the stand off to make it lay down on the desk. It’s time to think outside the box. Just put it on your desk in a different way as you want.

Not Only a Business Mini PC, But Also a Home Mini Computer

KAMRUI Express Service Channels and Warm Tips

*Regardless of your dissatisfaction with our products for any reason, please let us know so that the problem can be resolved promptly and quickly.

These are the steps to find the seller: “Log in Amazon” → “Your Account” → “Your orders” → “Ask Product Question.”

Service: We have a 12-month shelf life for return and exchange, the first reply within 24 hours, and 1-to-1 professional service personnel to answer any questions for you. Your use is only the beginning of our service.

Warm Tips:

Installing unofficial systems may cause driver incompatibility or instability. We highly recommended installing the official factory system.To avoid initial setup issues, the first time you use this mini pc, don’t connect network or wifi until the windows system of your mini pc is running.

【POWERFUL COMPUTING CAPACITY】The JK06 mini PC features a Quad-Core Intel 11th generation Jasper Laker N5100(4M Cache, up to 2.80 GHz). Lower power consumption of 6W makes it less heat, and more outstanding endurance performance than Intel Celeron J4125, N5105 and N5095 processors. It’s versatile enough to handle most any workload, light gaming or general computing. Whether you use it for professional or personal needs, it’ll give you all the power you require.
【ENJOY SPACE-SAVING WORKSPACE】The JK06 mini tower computer has black housing and a compact form factor that’s about 6.88×5.31×1.57-inch. A low-power PC that is so convenient that you can place this fully fetched Windows 11 Ready PC on your desk. With the free attached magnetic stand, you can place vertical or horizontal styles as you want. That is not the only advantage of the compact sized PC. With low power consumption, it’s a sleek alternative to a traditional tower PC.
【GREAT ASSISTANT FOR YOU】The JK06 mini desktop pc doesn’t just a honeycomb design, it also features ventilation holes on the housing to improve heat dissipation and reliability. This efficient thermal management keeps its cool even under the heaviest processing loads. Indeed, featuring the fanless design, when you work from home, and absolutely quiet micro computer will not disturb your cute babies or lovely pets.
【PERSONAL DATA DATABASE】8GB RAM memory means you get to the files that you need quicker. Storage 256GB M.2 Solid State Drive(MAX. 2TB), which provides plenty of storage room and high-performance responsiveness to access and run your applications quickly. There’s an SD card slot for additional storage. If you need more storage to expand, 2.5-inch SSD(MAX. 2TB)would be your great choice. Don’t let the storage to limit your imagination. To Creative, To Win.
【4K UHD DUAL SCREEN SUPPORT】The JK06 micro computer has one HDMI 2.0 and one VGA port that supports dual screen display, which setup has two modes-mirror or extended modes to analyze data better and improve work efficiency. Built-in Intel UHD Graphics, surfing websites using Chrome and other browsers, as well as watching Netflix, Youtube, Hulu, Philo, and other streaming services. It is fast enough to decode and accelerate UHD video content 4096×2160 video playback at 60 Hz.
【WORK AND PLAY ANYWHERE】The JK06 small PC has all the ports you need for all the peripherals you need including 1 x DC, 1 x Type C(data transfer only), 2 x USB 3.0, 2 x USB 2.0, 1 x LAN, 1 x HDMI, 1 x VGA, 1 x Audio in&out and 1 x TF Card slots. What’s more, it supports Linux, Wake On LAN, RTC Wake, and Auto Power On. Work and play your way virtually anywhere.
【FIND MORE PLEASURE ON JK06】The small form factor pc is perfect for a wide range of business scenarios, including signage, point-of-sale (POS) systems and intelligent vending machines. Whether it’s online chatting or professional video meetings, the dual band Wi-Fi 2.4G+5G connection is up to the task. It’s perfect for home office, light games, digital security and surveillance, digital signage, media center, conference room etc. Also Ideal for visually home entertainment, HTPC.
【ALL-AROUND PROTECTION】Say goodbye to the traditional desktop computer. KAMRUI JK06 mini pc with the magnetic holder which is equipped with a layer of silicone on the bottom. The comprehensive protection design makes leaves zero scratches on the desk. Moreover, whenever you need us, KAMRUI employees will always be here and handle all problems for you. Who wouldn’t want a mini pc? A great gift idea for your parent, friend, family or elders etc.

KAMRUI Mini PC

Choose KAMRUI, Choose Professional Mini PC

Product Description

Conscious design

Advanced performance and productivity

Available with Intel Core i5 processors, Intel HD graphics, and Intel vPro systems management, The OptiPlex 9010 enables increased power and productivity. Enjoy your bulk storage device!

Large internal space

Dual “3.5” internal drive bays supporting multiple hard disk drives capable of RAID configurations. This PC comes with 2T HDD so that you can store more.

Specifications Processor: Intel Core i5-3570 3.4 GHz Turbo 3.8 GHz Memory: 16GB DDR3 Storage: 2T HDD Optical driver: DVD Port: USB 3.0, DisplayPort, VGA, RJ-45.

Easy integration

Help get the most out of existing IT investments with legacy feature support available on the The OptiPlex 9010 like DP ports, a VGA port, a DP to HDMI adapter and an RJ-45 connection.Support Multi Monitor connection.

Powerful processing and drive options

Select from powerful 3nd Gen Intel Core i5-3570 3.4 GHz up to 3.8 GHz and integrated Intel HD UMA graphics along with other configurable options that let businesses configure the right OptiPlex 9010 for each user’s needs.

Upgrade Bay

The OptiPlex 9010 comes with DVD drive supports reading and DVD data.

Executive-class collaboration

A brand new installation of the Microsoft Windows 10 Pro 64 Bit Multi-Language English/French/Spanish Operating System, free of bloatware commonly installed from other manufacturers. As Microsoft’s stablest OS to date, Windows 10 Pro will maximize the utility of your PC for years to come.

DDR3 high-performance memory

Create a full featured and smoother experience with powerful processors, Oversized 16G DDR3 memory with Strictly selected particles.

2T hard disk drive

The OptiPlex 9010 comes with a 2T HDD so that you can store more photos, music and movies.

Gigabit Ethernet & USB Wi-Fi adapter

The OptiPlex 9010 connects to the Internet using a high speed Gigabit Ethernet adapter or stable performance Wi-Fi.

POWERFUL PROCESSOR – Your computer will be built with Intel’s top of the line Core i5 series processor so you can expect lightning fast, reliable and consistent performance and an exceptional PC experience.
SUPERIOR STORAGE AND MEMORY – Packed with ample solid state and hard drive space so you can store apps, games, photos, music and movies. Loaded with plenty of DDR3 RAM to help you zip through your tasks in a hurry and outperform the competition in any situation.
WINDOWS 10 LATEST RELEASE – We have added a brand new, fresh installation of Windows 10 Pro 64-Bit. It includes the new Microsoft Certificate of Authenticity (COA) and the Product Key.
MULTITASKING – You won’t have any issues with your regular day-to-day browsing with the featured 8GB DDR3 memory suited for multitasking power.
RENEWED – We follow strict requirements established for the MAR program by Microsoft. These requirements are designed to ensure that you receive a high quality and professionally refurbished computer.

Advanced performance and productivity

Available with Intel Core i5 processors, Intel HD graphics, and Intel vPro systems management, The OptiPlex 9010 enables increased power and productivity. Enjoy your bulk storage device!

Dual “3.5” internal drive bays supporting multiple hard disk drives capable of RAID configurations. This PC comes with 2T HDD so that you can store more.
